title: Chris Hayes | Trump Is Losing the Election, So He's Trying to Destroy Democracy: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Trump's path to reelection narrowing as the remaining swing states continue counting ballots.

Then, he talks to MSNBC's Chris Hayes.
